longBusinessSummary: US Copper Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada and the United States. It explores for copper, gold, and silver deposits. The company has 100% interests in the Moonlight-Superior copper project located in the Plumas County, California; and the Black Warrior project located in the Esmeralda County, Nevada. It also holds 100% interests in the Timore project located in Ontario; and the Warren Whiteside project that include various patented mining claims located in Whiteside Township in Ontario. The company was formerly known as Crown Mining Corp. and changed its name to US Copper Corp. in April 2021. US Copper Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Kitchener, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Stephen Ronald Dunn B.A., M.B.A.
